Employers

Set up ShiftSitter for your shift teams

Share the basics about your workforce so we can stand up your tenant, verification plan, and onboarding playbook for hourly, night, and weekend teams.

  • Built for operations, healthcare, retail, and plant schedules.
  • Verified access for employees plus clear guardrails for reciprocity.
  • We coordinate matching, rollout, and communications with your HR lead.

Employer onboarding intake

This intake sets up your ShiftSitter workspace. We will follow up with a short alignment call and a launch checklist.

We use this information to configure access, verification, and comms.
